content.question: int a = 1988;int b = 1990; String claim = " that the world’s athletes " +"competed in Olympic Games in "; String s = "It is " + true + claim + a +" but " + false + claim + b + "."; System.out.println(s);What, if anything, is printed when the code segment is executed?

choices.label: It is true that the world’s athletes competed in Olympic Games in a but false that the world’s athletes competed in Olympic Games in b.
It is true that the world’s athletes competed in Olympic Games in 1988 but false that the world’s athletes competed in Olympic Games in 1990.
Nothing is printed because the code segment does not compile.

content.answer: It is true that the world’s athletes competed in Olympic Games in 1988 but false that the world’s athletes competed in Olympic Games in 1990.

skill.text: 3.A: Determine the result or output based on statement execution order in an algorithm.
